Description:
A SOLID BEGINNING - FIRST HOME BUYER OR INVESTOR
It is a GREAT location being close to shops, schools and transport and a five minute drive to the city centre.
It is a GREAT neighbourhood set amongst a neat, tidy streetscape and close to the Bendigo Creek Walking Track.
It is in GREAT order throughout having been well maintained and looked after for many years.
The home features three bedrooms with a ceiling fan in main and a spacious lounge boasting a reverse cycle split system and large windows letting in lots of light. Adjacent is the meals area which joins the updated kitchen, features include a gas upright cooker, dishwasher, large pantry and plenty of bench space and cabinetry with views to the rear yard.
The family bathroom was updated some years ago and boasts a separate bath, 1.2m corner shower and basin/vanity unit. The laundry is near the back of the home; there is space for a dryer with existing cupboard and robe storage.
Other features include gas wall furnace, gas hot water, polished pine floorboards and timber sash windows.
To the rear of the home is a covered outdoor living space looking over the yard, separate single carport and a single lock up garage with power. There is a lovely grassed area, sealed concrete drive and good fencing.
This is neat and tidy home which would suit a live-in buyer or investor to take advantage of this fantastic Bendigo location.
Insights: 26 Fifth Avenue, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2017 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Address: Lot 1/144 St Killian Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Oh Wow! Look No More.
This stunning 32sq residence has it all! Comprising internally of 4 bedrooms, a totally separate and private master bedroom with executive style ensuite and 3 separate living areas (formal sitting room, separate family area and a fully included cinema room).
A pleasant bonus is the huge (6m x 4m) home/office with private entry, ideal for those working from home or it could be a games/billiard/entertainment area, massive 5th bedroom or anything else your imagination desires. The kitchen is of course stunning, with every luxury appointment you would expect.
Outside the 860m block has been fully landscaped for maximum impact and minimum effort. There is a terrific alfresco area for entertaining and the remote control double garage provides plenty of space for vehicles and for handyman activities. There is ample room for the caravan/boat available on site and plenty of parking for guests, clients and visitors. An easy five minute drive to CBD, this property is sited on a wide tree lined street, which is quiet and exclusive. Please contact Barry Plant Bendigo for further information or to arrange an inspection, which is guaranteed to delight.
Steve Timperley : 0438 442 844

Address: Lot 3/18a Heinz Street White Hills VIC 3550
Description:
Invest In The Best!
Brand new and now tenanted at $340 per week, this up-market townhouse is located in the inner suburb of White Hills in the booming Bendigo Region. Located in a quality infill location near the Bendigo Hospital precinct and a short drive into the CBD, the location is primed for future capital growth. Investors will love the yield on offer, with the townhouse achieving positive cashflow before the depreciation of approx. $9,000-$9,500 per annum is taken into account. Built to the highest standards by a quality local builder, the space and attention to detail is evident the moment you enter the property. From the striking rendered front to the oversized kitchen with extra cabinetry, the property offers large storage options, quality fixtures and fittings throughout, is fully landscaped and ready to go.
Jesse Gardner : 0477 277 560

Description:
EXCELLENT VALUE - INVESTMENT OR RESIDENCE
Offering a very affordable price range and neat presentation throughout, this two bedroom brick veneer unit will appeal to a variety of buyers in the market.
An open plan design incorporates a kitchen/meals and living space.
Both bedrooms include built in robes and there are separate bathroom and laundry facilities.
The rear yard offers space that you would not normally expect in a unit.
An air conditioner and gas heater ensure year round comfort.
Easy access to Bendigo's CBD, Botanical Gardens and popular Lake Weerona.
Darryn O'Keefe : 0418 509 563

Description:
Affordable Renovated Home
Walking distance from Weeroona College, Kindergartens and Lake Weeroona, here you can live in style in an area so close to all the amenities that you would require. A spacious fully renovated home, it comprises three robed bedrooms walk in to master, two bathrooms and generous living areas with spectacular polished floorboards. A central bathroom adds a little luxury while the modern open kitchen is certainly the hub of the home leading you to the comfortable lounge and outdoor private decked entertainment area with a third toilet for entertaining plus storage, as well as a study nook. Noteworthy additions include heating and cooling, double garage with auto door entry, extra car parking, Come an inspect the home behind the picket fence to appreciate all the hard work completed and you soon could be moving in and calling it your new family home.

Description:
Central to Everything
In a quiet cul-de-sac and nearby to the new hospital , Lake Weeroona and just minutes to the centre of town and schools, this immaculate family home has a lot to offer with 3 bedrooms and a study. The large living area and new kitchen are central to the heart of the home with quality appliances, the main bedroom is upstairs and could almost be called a parents retreat...large enough for a lounge suite, king bed, its own balcony, air-conditioning and new ensuite. The other 2 bedrooms are on the ground floor with Bir's and the study is currently being used as a 4th bedroom. Climate control is easy with Evaporative cooling, gas heat bank, and added ceiling fans in 2 of the bedrooms.
For the tradesman or those with a caravan or boat there is handy access to the rear of the home via Marroo St. Inspection will not disappoint in this well held neighbourhood.
Check OFI times Friday 13th for confirmation.
Angela Walter : 0401 282 976

Description:
RETIRING, STARTING OR INVESTING - THEN THIS IS THE HOUSE FOR YOU
Settled in a peaceful cul-de-sac, this comfortable home is situated in an incredibly convenient location! Nip around the corner for lunch or a coffee, hop on the bus into town or walk to local shops, primary schools and kindergarten. This is an accommodating home with spacious floorplan, comprising 3 bedrooms, 2 with built-in robes, master with walk-in robe and ensuite. Separate lounge, kitchen with ample cabinetry and adjacent meals area overlooking the backyard. Central 3 piece bathroom, spacious laundry, double linen closet, split system heating, cooling and external awnings. Outside offers a carport which easily houses two vehicles and could readily double as a fantastic all-weather entertaining area, generous sized backyard including double lock-up garage plus workshop. With some creative flair and TLC the surrounding gardens could transform into anything you can imagine, and allow kids and pets plenty of space and freedom to play safely.

Description:
Solid Beginnings
Positioned on the corner of Cahill Street, this light filled home features a large lounge room with air conditioner; kitchen and meals area with dishwasher, gas stove and 2 year old electric oven; central bathroom with shower over bath and vanity; laundry with stainless steel trough and separate toilet. Accommodation includes three double bedrooms, main with built in robe and ceiling fan and built in robes in the second bedroom.
The home has recently received brand new carpet and has ducted gas heating and evaporative cooling throughout. Externally the home has an undercover
entertaining area, double carport and a lined and insulated shed with shelving and power.
This is a great opportunity to secure a much loved family home in a convenient White Hills location close to shops, primary schools and Weeroona Secondary College.

Description:
RENOVATED WITH HEART AND SOUL - FULL OF SIMPLE PLEASURES
Loaded with character and charm this comfy home blends both timeless and contemporary features to cater for today's busy lifestyle. Lovingly renovated, all the hard work has been done for you, so you can move straight in and enjoy! Including high ceilings, beautiful slate tiled and polished timber floors, decorative cornices, intricate ceiling roses and glorious pressed metal dotted throughout. Comprising 3 bedrooms serviced by a well-lit family bathroom, practical and discreet European laundry and centrally located living room showcasing sunny bay window and cosy gas log fire. Awash with sunlight, the rear of the home comprises open plan dining and charming kitchen with timber benchtops, pantry, dishwasher and split system cooling complete with a picturesque garden outlook. The spacious timber deck with servery through to the kitchen really adds a sense of warmth, bringing the outdoors in as well as providing the perfect vantage point from which to relax or entertain with family and friends. The well-established backyard is generous in size comprising tool shed and chicken coop with space left over for your imagination to run wild and create. Located just around the corner from White Hills shops, short walking distance to primary schools, kindergarten, Botanical Gardens and offering easy access into the CBD, this home provides a haven full of life's simple pleasures.
Insights: 8 Lyons Street, White Hills VIC 3550 was last sold in 2016 and 40 other 3 bedroom house in White Hills have recently been sold.

Description:
A REAL SOLID STARTER!
This character filled home lends itself to a wide array of buyers. A perfect starter, a proven investment and an even greater property to downsize into, so close to town. Comprising four bedrooms, two containing built in robes and master with sizeable walk in robe and functional ensuite. The large “L” shaped kitchen, dining & living area is impressive, with a separate lounge with gentleman's favourite - the built in bar! Offering a huge laundry with shower and ample storage, separate to the bathroom. Ducted heating and cooling will ensure you are comfortable all year round. Verandahs on each side of the property, garden shed and access to the rear of the large 750 sq.m allotment. Close to the Botanical Gardens, White Hills School, sporting grounds and a short distance to Epsom or the CBD! This is a home which you must inspect.

Description:
The Ultimate Family Package
Packed with features and loaded with extras, this federation style home is not one to look past. Situated on approx 1500m2 and offering side access for your caravan, boat & trailers, mature purchasers and tradespeople will love the convenience on offer. Stepping in to the large formal lounge, you immediately get a sense of the space and comfort that the property provides. Featuring 4 bedrooms plus separate study or additional single bedroom/nursery, the home has plenty of space for the extended family. All bedrooms have BIRs & TV points and the main includes an ensuite and WIR. The family room is also spacious and is separate from the formal lounge, giving you 2 peaceful living zones for family entertaining. The kitchen comes fully equipped and the dining area overlooks the alfresco to connect the indoors with the outdoors seamlessly. As you'd expect from a home of this calibre, ducted heating & cooling is provided. Verandas front and back, gorgeous landscaped surrounds, 3 sheds and a huge rear yard complete the picture, giving you the ideal family package with room to spread out and entertain. Located in the inner suburb of White Hills with shopping, public transport and the new Bendigo Hospital all within striking distance, your investment is secure for many years to come.
Jesse Gardner : 0477 277 560

Description:
Hidden Treasure!
Situated in a quiet court this 3 bedroom, 2 living area, weatherboard home exudes plenty of charm and style. Featuring BIRS in all bedrooms, large study, lounge room with a gas log fire and pressed metal ceilings. The second living room is a large open area filled with plenty of natural light, featuring leadlight windows, wood fire and double sliding doors. The modern kitchen has a s/s dishwasher and the charm of old world high ceilings, pressed metal features and a wood fire stove. Cooling is taken care of with evap cooling throughout the home. Outside you have lots of areas for the family to relax and play, including a fernery to take in the morning sun. Close to schools, shops and public transport.

Description:
Family Home In Beautiful Estate
In a quiet, family friendly court just 4kms to the city centre is this beautifully built home 6 years young. Move in and enjoy living and entertaining, with nothing else to do! The masterpiece of the home is the open plan living with a cooks dream kitchen complete with stone benches and 900mm oven, all in neutral colours for you to add your own personality. Aluminium bifold doors open up to a generous decked area with gabled pergola to take in the views of the surrounding gums. The home comprises of 3 bedrooms, master with ensuite, WIR and ceiling fan, bedrooms with BIRs, plus a study/4th bedroom, ducted heating and evaporative cooling. Other features include established landscaped gardens, turf, garden shed, vegie patch, fruit trees, side access and automated sprinkler system, you can just sit back and enjoy entertaining in this home. Close to Schools shop, and lovely walking tracks.

Description:
Dreams Can Come True! Affordable Living
Perfectly positioned, located and priced is this most affordable 3 bedroom family home in popular White Hills. Ticking all the boxes in regards to features, benefits, floorplan and space, you will be very impressed upon inspection.
2 of the 3 bedrooms offer built-in robes, all have ceiling fans, plus there's an ensuite to the main bedroom which is situated upstairs via a spiral staircase.
Presentation is second to none with ample space in the user-friendly kitchen, overlooking the separate dining.
The great sized lounge leads you into the 2nd living/multi-purpose room.
From this room through glass sliders, you can access the inviting deck area outside.
The 3 piece bathroom and updated laundry are all very much perfect. Ducted cooling and a variety of other heating and cooling options are also available. Outside, the massive secure back yard incorporates a carport and garage, entertaining area and gardens.
Walk to schools, Botanical Gardens, local shops and just a short drive to Bendigo Central.
Nekti Tzouroutis : 0412 242 321

Description:
Immaculate Family Home
In a great location that's expanding & booming, this brick & tiled roof family home has many advantages. The as new home boasts 4 light & airy bedrooms, one currently used as an office study. There are wall-length built-in robes in all. The lounge room makes great use of the bay window space & has timber venetians & a lovely outlook over the front yard. Fresh & well-maintained, the home maintains its stylish edge, with neutral decor & central heating & cooling. The kitchen has a wall oven & space for a dishwasher, plus plenty of storage as well as a pantry. The generous sized bench tops also double as a beaut breakfast bar. The home is located opposite vacant land & just around the corner from public transport. The garden has been planted for low maintenance & the fences make the backyard very secure. There is plenty of space for the kid's trampoline & a handy garden shed.
Luke Goggin Real Estate - We Get Results 5442 1422

Description:
AFFORDABLE LIVING IN A PERFECT POSITION
Nestled in a peaceful tree lined street this triple fronted weatherboard home is sure to impress. Tastefully updated with fresh colour tones, plush carpets, new tiles, polished timber floors and a sparkling new kitchen with 600ml stainless steel cooktop and dishwasher.
-3 bedrooms, 2 with B.I.R's
-Tiled meals adjoining kitchen
-Open study, ducted heating, refrigerated cooling
-Single carport, garage/workshop
-Original 3 piece bathroom
The private, established low maintenance 595sqm allotment offers shade and space for children, Ideal for first home buyers and investors.... Currently returning $295pw available with vacant possession.
